committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Power and Offshore Energy Resources

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide for prepayment of indebtedness on the Solano Project and to execute an agreement for the transfer of title to specified water supply facilities of the Solano Project with an organization composed of the users of water from the Solano Project, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Solano Project Indebtedness Prepayment Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with the water users of the Solano Project in Solano County, California, for: (1) the prepayment of the remaining capital indebtedness on the Solano Project; and (2) the transfer to the water users of all right, title, and interest in the land and improvements forming the water supply facilities of the Project. Outlines price and transfer conditions. Requires the water users to assume all liability for administration, operation, and maintenance of such facilities upon such transfer. Declares that the Secretary is responsible for, and retains full jurisdiction and control over, Lake Berryessa and retains full title to all recreational facilities.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide for prepayment of indebtedness on the Solano Project and to execute an agreement for the transfer of title to specified water supply facilities of the Solano Project with an organization composed of the users of water from the Solano Project, and for other purposes.
